mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getNoticeDiscussList */ SELECT a.id 'id' ,a.category 'category' ,a.subject 'subject' ,a.contents 'contents' ,a.attached_file 'attachedFile' ,a.writer 'writer' ,a.write_from 'writeFrom' ,a.write_to 'writeTo' ,a.is_for_all_seller 'isForAllSeller' ,a.is_for_all_customer 'isForAllCustomer' ,a.is_for_notice 'isForNotice' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM cmm_notice_discuss a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.id = #{id} AND UPPER(a.category) = UPPER(#{category}) AND UPPER(a.subject) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{subject}), '%') AND UPPER(a.contents) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{contents}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writer) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writer}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writeFrom) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writeFrom}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writeTo) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writeTo}), '%') AND UPPER(a.is_for_all_seller) = UPPER(#{isForAllSeller}) AND UPPER(a.is_for_all_customer) = UPPER(#{isForAllCustomer}) AND UPPER(a.is_for_notice) = UPPER(#{isForNotice}) AND a.creator = #{creator} ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntForNoticeDiscussList */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cmm_notice_discuss a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.id = #{id} AND UPPER(a.category) = UPPER(#{category}) AND UPPER(a.subject) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{subject}), '%') AND UPPER(a.contents) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{contents}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writer) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writer}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writeFrom) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writeFrom}), '%') AND UPPER(a.writeTo) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{writeTo}), '%') AND UPPER(a.is_for_all_seller) = UPPER(#{isForAllSeller}) AND UPPER(a.is_for_all_customer) = UPPER(#{isForAllCustomer}) AND UPPER(a.is_for_notice) = UPPER(#{isForNotice}) AND a.creator = #{creator}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteNoticeDiscuss */ DELETE FROM cmm_notice_discuss WHERE id = #{id}
